## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? What pain point does it address?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternatives Considered
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Cases
Provide specific examples of how this feature would be used:
1. Use case 1
2. Use case 2
3. Use case 3

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or examples about the feature request here.

## Impact
- [ ] This would improve the documentation
- [ ] This would improve the website experience
- [ ] This would help new users understand SuperGitSight better
- [ ] Other (please describe)

## Note
This repository contains documentation only. Feature requests for the SuperGitSight application itself are welcome and will be forwarded to the development team.
